content: this is dmg and we're making a bag alright I'll make a bag it's not gonna
be short and simple to grab a ziplock bag and that's it that's a tutorial like
but in reality you just grab some of the polystyrene we've saved from earlier
from the rubble videos and such and grab a little bit of this masking tape just
about 2 inches and fold it over and clean up the edges and then grab another
2 inches and fold it over the other sides so you could create a cross and
then put the thing in the middle and fold it I've just turned this way and
then start to massage and stick the bits of masking tape over one another do this
slowly so that you can create all the little folds and things of the bag and
slowly but surely work your way up to the top and pinch and push and
everything into the polystyrene you could also use tin foil as the wadding
if you wish it doesn't necessarily need to put be polystyrene I like polystyrene
because it's light and then I'm just going to push in and pinch the top and
twist it around so we've created the top of the bag and now we're going to create
a drawstring and pinching out the top there so as would after it's been tied
so you go grab a piece of string just cut off from two inch piece of one-inch
piece and pull it apart so you've got all the little sub strings that are
created grab one of those put a little bit of hot glue around the top of the
bag and just pull that string around it so the hot glue will hold it in place
and then just twist it around on itself as though it is now tied so that's
relatively easy and quite simple to do then just trim off the excess and we're
almost there we're now just an again create a base so just quickly just cut
out you don't need to measure this just cut out a nice little circle and if you
want you can use the clear plastic base you see in the fire video
and use one of those if you like I'm just gonna create a bit of a shadow to
this so it can go on pretty much any time and blob hot glue and stick back
down so there we have the basic bag now I'm just gonna have a mixture of little
bit yellow and whites and just dry brush it on there
wait brush it a little bit more and add a little bit of yellow and then for the
actual string I'm just going to apply it white and to just highlight again in
white and there you go there is the bag couldn't be easier
so that is a very simple bag couldn't be simpler than that so if you like this
video like button share this video with your friends and leave a comment in the
section below I want to hear all your bag stories about how you once a bag man
in bag town stealing bag from baggy people wearing
back pants
